title: PLAYING WITH BITS
text:
The problem is verysimple.Youare given a even numberNand an integerKand you have to find the greatest odd numberMless thanNsuch that the sum of digits in binary representation ofMis at mostK.InputFor each test case, you are given an even numberNand an integerK.OutputFor each test case, output the integerMif it exists, else print-1.Constraints1 ≤T≤ 1042 ≤N≤ 1090 ≤K≤ 30ExampleInput:2
10 2
6 1Output:9
1ExplanationFirst case whenN= 10,K= 2Binary representation of10is1010and binary representation of9is1001, hence greatest odd number less than10whose sum of digits in its binary representation is at most2is9. Henceoutputis9.
